item.title: Create ddns on your current bind9 server
item.description: Tasks. We have example.com server with bing9 server. At home we have a server with dynamic IP. Pin the dynamic IP to your own server. -> home.example.com Server The document asserts a working BIND setup already in place. Installing and configuring BIND is out of scope here. Creating a key-pair To create a key-pair, we’ll be using dnssec-keygen. server$ dnssec-keygen -a HMAC-SHA512 -b 512 -n USER home.example.com. This creates two files, which will be named differently based on individual runs.
